channel.title: How To Add Npc's [TuT]
channel.description:
okey first up u will need an source go config. in config u will find autospawn.cfg in autospawn.cfg u will find text copy one text like [code]spawn = 521 2656 3491 0 2663 3304 2659 3300 1[/code]
do ::mypos In Game and u will see like xpos:3448 ypos:3497
the first three number are the npc id other are spawn = 521 2656 3491 0 2663 3304 2659 3300 1 this xpos ypos face derections
if u dont got ::mypos on server go characters and take ur account and u will be see xpos:2448 and ypos:3497
compile and restart and your npc will stand there! :P

item.title: How To Add Npc's [TuT]
item.dc:creator: @xlogga123 xlogga123
item.description:
@xlogga123 wrote:

okey first up u will need an source
go config. in config u will find autospawn.cfg
in autospawn.cfg u will find text
copy one text like

spawn = 521	2656	3491	0	2663	3304	2659	3300	1

do ::mypos In Game and u will see like xpos:3448 ypos:3497

the first three number are the npc id other are
spawn = 521 2656 3491 0 2663 3304 2659 3300 1
this xpos ypos face derections

if u dont got ::mypos on server
go characters and take ur account
and u will be see xpos:2448 and ypos:3497

compile and restart and your npc will stand there!

Read full topic
